title: FS: 30 Card Lot of Low Grade T205 w/HOF's and SP's **FINAL PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: 30 Card Lot of Low Grade T205 w/HOF's and SP's **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards available for sale or trade. As you can see by the scans, most of these are low grade cards and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing)

Clarke - $26
Hoblitzell (name incorrect, no "Cin", PSA 1.5) - $80
Wallace - $23
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!

i'll take (if still available):

Crandall ("t" not crossed) - $9
Devlin - $9
Murphy - $9
Wolter (card in two pieces) - $7 

will pm you about these and the others i want....
thanks!
One last bump for a final price drop to clear out the rest of this lot.  Thanks for looking!
